recipe_name: Tea and orange-glazed plums with watercress
author: Brian Turner
method: Place the teabags into a cup, pour over the boiling water and leave to infuse for three minutes. Remove the teabags and pour the tea-infused water into a small saucepan. Add the orange juice and brown sugar and place over a high heat. Simmer for six minutes, or until reduced by half. Add the plums to the syrup and simmer for 1-2 minutes. To serve, pile the watercress onto a serving plate and pour over the plums.
ingredients: 2 lapsang souchong teabags,  200ml/7fl oz boiling water,  1 orange, juice only,  1 tbsp soft brown sugar,  2 plums, stones removed, chopped,  small handful watercress, to serve
